entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 8:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
